mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(customer_id, hotel_id, title, content, entry_date, modify_date, score) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{hotelId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply INNER JOIN user ON customer_id = user.id INNER JOIN hotel_item ON hotel_id = hotel_item.id WHERE reply.hotel_id = #{hotelId} ORDER BY reply.id DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId}
SELECT * FROM reply INNER JOIN hotel_item ON reply.hotel_id = hotel_item.id WHERE reply.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET score = #{score}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
